name: BINKY XIV: Party Monsters
description:
If you have the time, please read "onMasterSlaveAndGodotDevelopers" in txt or pdf formats

The fourteenth in the award winning BINKY Series.

LEgend has it, in the dungeons of BUBBO LAND,

LIve the PARTY MONSTERS, creatures of magic,

WHo love to have an enjoyable time underground.

BUt the great BINKY lost the INTERACT button,

ANd can only mash the bar of space to cast USeless magic spells to all of them monsters!

Controls:

AD,Left and Right Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar - Cast Magic

Credits:

Monster Art: Creatures from Hieronymous Bosch Paintings https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triptych_of_the_Temptation_of_St._Anthony https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Temptation_of_St_Anthony_(Kansas_City)

Creatures from Last Armageddon

Creatures from Sugoro Quest: Dice no Senshitachi

Creatures from Shi Kong Xing Shou

Creatures from Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord http://www.pekori.jp/~emonoya/monster/index.html

Creatures from Pokemon Gold Beta

Creatures from PRODUCE

Sams from Unterbildungsroman (2015)

Thank you to mno for finding some samples.

Music:

Sound Effects from Clickteam and Link: The Faces of Evil

This midis found by knighTeen87 King's Field (JP) - Floor 2 Composed by Koji Endo, Kaoru Kono.
